org.shipp.util

Class MenuEventController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shipp.util.MenuEventController

  • public class MenuEventController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to control event of menu, open and close using a static methods
    Author:
    Leonardo Salles Code borrowed from specified author to satisfy the sliding menu feature of the app
